name: Kill Quota
description:
An endless-wave style shooter game

This game was created for the semester final project at my university. Took me about 15 days to complete everything with the scripting and UI designing.

This is also my first completed game. As I was in a rush , the settings panel was left incomplete however, that will be fixed quite soon. I would love to get your feedback as it would help a beginning game developer like myself! Cheers :D

Created using Unity3D.

Controls: W, S, A, D - Move forward Left mouse button - Fire R- Reload E - Interact
